headline: Building An Income Portfolio? 3 Picks To Start With For An Average Yield Of 6%+
summary: For a fresh income-focused portfolio, I recommend Realty Income, VICI Properties, and Verizon. Click here to read more about O, VICI, and VZ stocks.
